s.text: Asked on Late Edition about George W.'s repeated use of the F-word in his Talk magazine interview, Gary Bauer quips, "I found that article surprising--[although] I'll leave it to Governor Bush to talk with his mom about the language he uses."
(Tim Russert asks, "Will you pledge today that you will support George W. Bush if he's the nominee?"
(On Late Edition , Dole and Bauer appear one after the other, and the contrast is instructive.
